name: Royal Jelly
description:
FUNCTIONS

Royal Jelly helps maintain lower cholesterol level.

It also helps promote mental alertness.

It helps combat dizziness, buzzing in the ears.

It is found to be helpful to people who suffer from nervousness, anxiety and massive memory loss.

Royal Jelly has also been found to greatly improve energy levels, thereby eliminating fatigue.

It fortifies your natural immune system to help your body fight infections and diseases.

Surprisingly, it has been known in treating bronchial asthma and liver disease.

It helps enhance sexual desire and performance.

It treats stomach ulcer and bone fractures.

It has the ability to restore skin's youthfulness and improve the skin beauty. This is possible because royal jelly is rich in nucleic acids - Gelatin, which is the one of the precursors of collagen. Collagen is famous as anti-aging element.
